name: Les is More...
description:
*** 3RD ROOM COIN IS IN THE TOP LEFT CORNER!!** MUST GRAB TO MOVE ON

Collect the coins to move to the next room!

Move with A + D

Jump with W

Attack with SPACE

P Returns to the Title Screen. Please play and rate!!!

In this game, Les is literally more. He can be more Angry, more Sleepy, and more or less, Les. This was super fun and super challenging to make, seeing as how we took the prompt,  turned it into a theme and did the opposite by adding so much to it!

This game was made by Joe Knapp and Zach Knapp for the BlackThornProd, 'Less is More,' game jam. We created EVERYTHING from scratch EXCEPT the sweet music and SFX which we got from ERIC SKIFF @ Eric Skiff.com, "Resistor Anthems", and "8-Bit Style" SFX from OPENGAMEART.ORG.
